text: int main ( ) { int T ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { int * * A , N , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; A = ( int * * ) malloc ( N * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { A [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = N - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) A [ i ] [ j ] += max ( A [ i + 1 ] [ j ] , A [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , A [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
